query:
INSERT INTO case_assignments (analystId, reportId, councilSessionId, priority, status, dueAt)
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' LIMIT 1),
  wr.id,
  cs.id,
  CASE 
    WHEN wr.severity = 'critical' THEN 'urgent'
    WHEN wr.severity = 'high' THEN 'high'
    WHEN wr.severity = 'medium' THEN 'medium'
    ELSE 'low'
  END,
  'assigned',
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY)
FROM watchdog_reports wr
JOIN council_sessions cs ON cs.subjectId = wr.id
ORDER BY wr.id DESC LIMIT 5;

    WHEN wr.severity = 'high' THEN 'high'
